info.title: College Football Data API
info.description: This is an API for query various college football datasets and analytics. API keys can be acquired from the CollegeFootballData.com website.

get.description: Retrieve Points Added Above Replacement (PAAR) ratings for kickers

parameters.description: Optional year filter to get historical conference affiliations
parameters.name: year

get.description: Retrieves information on teams playing in the highest division of CFB
Retrieves historical matchup details for two given teams
Retrieve 247 Team Talent Composite for a given year
Retrieves aggregated player statistics for a given season

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

get.description: Retrieves advanced season statistics for teams

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Garbage time exclusion filter, defaults to false
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.description: Retrieves advanced statistics aggregated by game

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Garbage time exclusion filter, defaults to false
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

parameters.description: Year filter, required when no team specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required when no team specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Optional recruit type classification filter, defaults to HighSchool
parameters.name: classification

get.description: Retrieves aggregated recruiting statistics by team and position grouping

parameters.description: Optional recruit type filter, defaults to HighSchool
parameters.name: recruitType

parameters.description: Optional start year range, defaults to 2000
parameters.name: startYear

parameters.description: Optional end year range, defaults to current year
parameters.name: endYear

get.description: Retrieves SP+ ratings for a given year or school

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

get.description: Retrieves aggregated historical conference SP+ data
Retrieves historical SRS for a year or team

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Optional week filter, defaults to last available week in the season
parameters.name: week

get.description: Retrieves historical Football Power Index (FPI) ratings

parameters.description: year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Search term for matching player name
parameters.name: searchTerm

get.description: Retrieves player usage data for a given season

parameters.description: Optional exclude garbage time flag, defaults to false
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.description: Retrieves returning production data. Either a year or team filter must be specified.

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

get.description: Retrieves transfer portal data for a given year
Query Predicted Points values by down and distance
Retrieves historical team PPA metrics by season

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

get.description: Retrieves historical team PPA metrics by game

parameters.description: Optional flag to exclude garbage time plays
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.description: Queries player PPA statistics by game

parameters.description: Week filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: week

parameters.description: Team filter, required if week not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Threshold value for minimum number of plays
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.description: Optional flag to exclude garbage time plays
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.description: Queries player PPA statistics by season

parameters.description: Year filter, required if playerId not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Player ID filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: playerId

parameters.description: Threshold value for minimum number of plays
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.description: Optional flag to exclude garbage time plays
parameters.name: excludeGarbageTime

get.description: Query play win probabilities by game
Queries field goal expected points values
Queries live play-by-play data and advanced stats

parameters.description: Year filter, required if game id not specified
parameters.name: year

200.description: UserInfo object containing patron level and remaining calls, or null if not authenticated.

get.description: Retrieves information about the user, including their Patreon level and remaining API calls.

parameters.description: Required year filter (except when id is specified)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Game id filter to retrieve a single game
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Required year filter (along with one of week, team, or conference), unless id is specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Optional week filter, required if team and conference not specified
parameters.name: week

parameters.description: Optional team filter, required if week and conference not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Optional conference filter, required if week and team not specified
parameters.name: conference

parameters.description: Optional id filter to retrieve a single game
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Required year filter (along with one of week, team, or conference), unless id is specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Optional week filter, required if team and conference not specified
parameters.name: week

parameters.description: Optional team filter, required if week and conference not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Optional conference filter, required if week and team not specified
parameters.name: conference

parameters.description: Optional id filter to retrieve a single game
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieve historical and future weather data (Patreon only)

parameters.description: Year filter, required if game id not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Filter for retrieving a single game
parameters.name: gameId

parameters.description: Year filter, required if team not specified
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Team filter, required if year not specified
parameters.name: team

parameters.description: Optional division classification filter, defaults to fbs
parameters.name: classification

get.description: Retrieves list of player position categories for the NFL Draft
Retrieves historical head coach information and records
Retrieves an advanced box score for a game

tags.name: metrics
tags.description: Data relating to Predicted Points and other metrics

tags.name: adjustedMetrics
tags.description: Metrics adjusted for opponent strength and other factors

tags.name: info
tags.description: General information about the API and user
